The purpose of the app is to showcase how voice commands can be used to interact with stored data, making information access seamless and intuitive for users. Project Scope: Utilise Whisper to convert spoken commands into text. Implement TTS technology to vocalise responses from the app. Retrieve and manipulate data from a specified database based on voice commands. Create a simple UI to facilitate interaction and display information. Tech Stack Recommendation: For a project of this nature, a modern and flexible tech stack is crucial for seamless integration and scalability. We recommend: Frontend: React Native for cross-platform mobile app development, ensuring wide accessibility and a responsive user interface. Backend: Node.js for its compatibility with React Native and its efficiency in handling asynchronous operations, which is essential for real-time voice processing. AI and Voice Processing: OpenAI's Whisper for speech-to-text conversion and a suitable TTS service for vocalising text responses. These choices are due to their advanced capabilities and ease of integration. Database: MongoDB or Supabase, depending on the project's specific needs. MongoDB is recommended for its flexibility with document-based data, which can be beneficial for dynamic voice command responses. Supabase offers real-time data capabilities, making it a strong candidate for applications requiring instant feedback. Payment Integration: Although not the focus of the proof of concept, the chosen tech stack should be compatible with payment gateways like Adyen for future scalability. Responsibilities: Design and develop the proof of concept according to the project scope. Ensure the integration of Whisper and TTS technology functions seamlessly with database interactions. Create a minimalistic yet functional user interface for testing and demonstration purposes. Document the development process, challenges, and solutions for future reference. Requirements: Proven experience in mobile app development, especially with React Native and Node.js. Familiarity with AI and voice processing technologies, particularly Whisper and TTS. Experience with database management, preferably MongoDB or Supabase. Ability to work independently, with strong problem-solving skills and creativity. Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration and feedback.Skills: OpenAI API, ChatGPT, Python, Machine Learning, JavaScript, MongoDB

title: Develop transcription app similar to otter.ai - Upwork
description: We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to join our project on a freelance basis. The project involves developing an advanced voice note-taking application, which integrates voice transcription features with a text editor inspired by the organizational capabilities of Notion and the transcription accuracy of Otter.ai. This application is built on Next.js 13, React, Convex, and Tailwind and aims to transform spoken words into structured, editable text in real-time. Responsibilities: - Develop and integrate live voice-to-text transcription features within a Notion clone text editor. - Implement UI/UX design enhancements to create an intuitive and user-friendly interface. - Work with APIs for voice transcription, specifically focusing on accuracy, real-time synchronization, and speaker identification. - Enhance the application with advanced editing features, audio synchronization with transcription, and cloud storage solutions for cross-device access. - Address scalability and performance optimization to handle heavy use. What Has Been Created So Far: - Application Foundation: A voice note-taking application based on a Fullstack Notion Clone using Next.js 13, React, Convex, and Tailwind. Key Implemented Features: - Real-time database, Notion-style editor, light and dark modes. - Infinite children documents, trash can & soft delete, authentication, file management. - Expandable and collapsible sidebar, mobile responsiveness, web publishing. - Live transcription feature using basic Web Speech API for real-time voice-to-text conversion. Current Achievements: - Microphone Component: Captures voice input from the user and performs live transcription. - Editor Component: Displays the transcribed text and allows for basic editing. - Transcription Context: Manages and shares transcription state across components. - Integration Setup: Preliminary setup for final transcription processing using OpenAI (not fully implemented). What's Missing: - Final Transcription Accuracy and Integration: Need to fully integrate and enhance final transcription accuracy with a service like OpenAI for high-quality transcription. - Real-Time Synchronization: Improve the synchronization between live transcription and text display to ensure seamless updates. - Speaker Identification: Implement functionality to identify and differentiate between multiple speakers in a conversation. - Audio Sync and Playback: Develop a feature for audio playback synchronized with the transcribed text, including timestamps. - UI/UX Refinement: Enhance the user interface and user experience to be more intuitive, engaging, and accessible. Requirements: - Proficiency in Next.js 13, React, and Tailwind CSS. - Experience with Convex or similar backend services. - Experience with real-time voice-to-text transcription technologies and APIs (e.g., Google Cloud Speech-to-Text, Azure Speech Services, IBM Watson Speech to Text). - Familiarity with implementing advanced UI/UX designs and responsive web development. - Ability to write clean, scalable, and well-documented code.Skills: Next.js, React, Full-Stack Development, Web Application, JavaScript, Whisper AI

title: Whatsapp CRM Tool / Webbased for Agency - Upwork
description: Developing a WhatsApp web-based CRM ticketing system tailored for agencies managing multiple company accounts is essential to streamline communication and ticket management processes. 1. *Multichannel Support for Agency Management*: Develop a WhatsApp web-based CRM ticketing system tailored for agencies tasked with managing multiple company accounts. This system should seamlessly integrate and manage numerous WhatsApp numbers, streamlining operations for agency professionals. 2. *Effortless Management Interface*: Create a user-friendly management interface within the web-based CRM platform, enabling agencies to seamlessly select and manage multiple WhatsApp numbers. This interface should include functionalities like number assignment, permission management, and analytics, without the need for integration into other agency tools. 3. *Agency-Exclusive Ticket Management*: Agency internal employees should exclusively manage tickets within the web-based CRM ticketing system. Customers will not have direct access. The system should provide comprehensive tools and functionalities for agency professionals to efficiently handle incoming messages, assign tickets, and track resolution status across multiple WhatsApp numbers. 4. *User-Friendly Interface*: Design an intuitive and user-friendly interface within the web-based CRM ticketing system, facilitating easy configuration and management of WhatsApp numbers for agencies and seamless interaction with the ticketing system for internal employees. 5. *Scalability*: Ensure the system's scalability to accommodate the addition of new WhatsApp numbers and efficiently manage a high volume of customer inquiries while maintaining optimal performance and reliability. 6. *Security and Data Privacy*: Implement robust security measures within the web-based CRM ticketing system to encrypt all WhatsApp data and comply with stringent data privacy regulations. 7. *Integration with WhatsApp Cloud API (Application Programming Interface)*: Ensure that technicians responsible for system management have expertise in utilizing the WhatsApp Cloud API for seamless integration and troubleshooting purposes within the web-based CRM ticketing system. 9. *Analytical Capabilities (Add-on for Later Releases)*: Offer advanced analytics and reporting features within the web-based CRM ticketing system to analyze customer interactions, generate performance reports, and derive actionable insights to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction. 10. *Customizability*: Allow for customization of the web-based CRM ticketing system interface and workflows to accommodate the specific requirements and preferences of agencies, enhancing overall user experience and system adaptability. Outro: One of the crucial aspects of this WhatsApp web-based CRM ticketing system is its integration with the new WhatsApp Cloud API, ensuring seamless communication and interaction between the CRM platform and WhatsApp messaging. Additionally, for the front-end interface, it's feasible to utilize standard CRM templates or front-end ticketing templates, eliminating the need for new development efforts and providing a streamlined user experience for agencies and internal employees alike.Skills: Web Application, Amazon Web Services, API, API Integration, Customer Relationship Management
